meanings.definition: The state of being close to another person or people.
meanings.sent1: Family dinners always bring a sense of togetherness.
meanings.sent2: The togetherness of the team was evident during the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The togetherness of the siblings was evident in their synchronized dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The togetherness of the community was like a warm embrace on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The togetherness of the choir created a beautiful harmony of voices.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being united or in harmony.
meanings.sent1: The togetherness of the colors in the painting created a stunning masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The togetherness of the band members was key to their successful performance.
meanings.sent3: The togetherness of flavors in the dish made it a culinary delight.
meanings.sent4: The togetherness of the orchestra was like a symphony of cooperation.
meanings.sent5: The togetherness of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious cake.

meanings.definition: The act of being together with others in a group or gathering.
meanings.sent1: The togetherness of the students during the field trip was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The togetherness of the crowd at the concert created an electric atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The togetherness of the animals at the zoo made for an entertaining show.
meanings.sent4: The togetherness of the team building exercise strengthened their bond.
meanings.sent5: The togetherness of the community picnic was a joyous occasion.
